title: Mastery Token not given!
body:
I just played a game on one for all and got a S+ on my malphite that is mastery rank 5 already. 

Riot what the heck? I read the mastery rank 6 and 7 i should of gotten one?

replies.body: Zombiemaster is spot on.  Looking into this, it looks like the match was in One For All.  Per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, it's necessary play normal or ranked SR for a token.  Good luck!

please fix mastery taunts on multiple champions, probally any of the flying ones, heres a post to my bug report that has not been helped at all, its been there for 7 months and i bumped it 3 months ago and now bumping it again...thanks 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/lE9PZa0q-jannasoraka-more-4-7-mastery-taunt-bug-gameplay

supposely one of the dev's considers this spam, im almost guessing cluvie cause i psoted alot on there comments and got a notification that im spamming....i wouldnt have to post on these comments if someone actually looked at my post, and did something about the mastery, its been 7 months, and ive been told on 2 support tickets that you guys have been told and still nothing done about it, or you guys just really dont like support players, because 90% of the bugged taunts are on my support characters which i main...zzz
Unfortunately, you cannot earn mastery tokens on ARAM, Twisted Treeline, or any of the rotating game modes. You can only earn them on normal and ranked Summoner's Rift.
